name: Temple of Cosmika
description:
This is my first ever game, Temple of Cosmika!

It is an ever changing maze, with 3 different levels of difficulty.

You are trapped inside the Temple of Cosmika, the Goddess of ever changing space and time.  Can you escape it?

Best played at 1440x990.

Find me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/erisaesis/ .
